description.value:
You add two new wizard encounter attack powers to your spellbook. The powers must be of 13th level or lower, and the two function as daily attack powers for you.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.tLqVc2FPuMabg0Iv]{Hold Monster}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.DMVmkegKCS5vyaTx]{Prismatic Burst}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.VeQY4F3HpxGuKWlk]{Thunderlance}
